title: Former Tottenham and Crystal Palace midfielder John Bostock joins Bursaspor
description: Former Tottenham and Crystal Palace midfielder John Bostock has completed a move to Turkish Super Lig side Bursaspor.
content: RC Lens confirmed Bostock had completed negotiations with Bursaspor on Wednesday evening and will leave the Ligue 1 side, subject to a medical.The 25-year-old was linked with a move to Ligue 1 side Angers by newspaper reports in France in early January.The midfielder's deal with Lens was due to expire at the end of the season.Bostock signed for Crystal Palace in 2007 and left for Tottenham a year later having made only four appearances.He did not play a single first-team game at Spurs and eventually left the club in 2013 after a string of loan spells.
